title: Suppression 3
name: Suppression 3
description:
Someone leaked plans of the sit-in to university officials days before the planned action. As a result, the main campus area was overpopulated with UKPD, Lexington police, and even unmarked special agents.

The obvious show of force both excites and upsets students; The Administration are listening, but they are forcing students out of their own spaces.

The Main Building is locked down. Tension weighs on each participant.
